StickerSlider.name: Sticker
StickerSlider.description:
Choose a sticker from here. Stickers include:
0: Fully transparent sticker (visually a softtoggle).
1: Essex.
2: Sleepy Kanna.
3: Kanna.
4: Mai.
5: Ram.
6: Rem.
7: Rias.
8: Yuno.
9: Ryuko.
10: Nagatoro.
11: Custom image named <cl>custom.png</c>. Nothing too large, please. It's for your own good.

BackgroundSlider.name: Background (Editor Only)
BackgroundSlider.description:
Choose a level editor background from here. Backgrounds include:
0: Fully transparent background (visually a softtoggle).
1: Aqua.
2: Astolfo.
3: Asuna.
4: Azuki.
5: Beatrice.
6: Cinnamon.
7: Coconut.
8: Darkness.
9: Echidna.
10: Gray.
11: Sleepy Kanna.
12: Kanna.
13: Mai.
14: Ram.
15: Rem.
16: Rias.
17: Yuno.
18: Ryuko.
19: Custom image named <cl>customBG.png</c>. Nothing too large, please. It's for your own good.

ShowStickerInEditor.name: Show Sticker in Editor
ShowStickerInEditor.description: Show the Sticker in the Editor

ShowBackgroundInEditor.name: Show Background in Editor
ShowBackgroundInEditor.description: Show the Background in the Editor
